Digital Service Solutions

E-Services

Transform your business processes with our E-Services automation platform. Manage document changes, business change requests, and service approvals all in one place.

Document

Document Change Request

Prevent Document Corruption

Document Change request ensures that no unauthorized access can make any changes to the key documents!

Key Feature

Organize change Request

The document change request process can be formulated based on your organizational needs from predefined formats!

Key Feature

Business

Business Change Request (BCR)

Format Business changes

Organize your business change request with our workflow templates which can be customizable to fit your criteria!

Key Feature

Enable request & approval

Give user based access to submit request form and have the separate access to project coordinator or vendor for approval of requested changes!

Key Feature

Non-Conformity

Non-Conformity Reporting (NCR)

Identify Failures instantly

With our Non conformity reporting module you can immediately identify glitches or failures from the conformed set of guidelines!

Key Feature

Process remedial actions

Once the failures are identified, remedial prescriptions can be properly communicated and processed!

Key Feature

IT

IT Service Request & Approval

Organize IT service requests

With our system you can easily identify and organize the request type and nature of urgency it demands, so as to process it accordingly!

Key Feature

Process service delivery

Clear set of procedures are in place to approve/disapprove and assign the request to the process owner in order to resolve it successfully!

Key Feature

Capital

Capital Expenditure Note Approval (CapEx)

Raising Capital Requirement Made Easy

No need to go through series of long shot mails to all stakeholders to approve a purchase of an asset, now you can raise the request in our form and all stakeholders will receive the request in proper format!

Key Feature

Approval and Purchase Order

Based on the predefined parameters the stakeholders can approve or disapprove the request and process it further, in case of approval by raising purchase order through predefined channel!

Key Feature
SEE ALL THE SERVICES
KYC

KYC Update Request and Approval

Never misidentify your people

Whether you are a recruitment firm dealing with thousands of job applicants or a big organization doing a background check on its people, our system would help you organize and manage their KYC in a format that fits your criteria!

Key Feature

Risk & Compliance assessment

You can now record and assess their credit worthiness and the legal liabilities so as to take better decisions in assigning resources to them!

Key Feature
SEE ALL THE SERVICES
Salary

Salary & Payroll Processing

Manage salary, deductions & incentives

Get a proper breakdown of employee salaries in a designated format accounting for the tax & other deductions and perks/incentives with our HRMS!

Key Feature

Generate reports & pay slips

Create salary slips from our predefined customizable templates and get reports and analytics on CTC of employees!
